articles.title: R255m to keep 10 000 soldiers on SA streets to maintain law and order - Ramaphosa - News24
articles.description: The internal deployment of the South African National Defence Force has been reduced from 25 000 to 10 000. Ramaphosa's latest deployment, from 13 August to 13 September, will come at a cost of R255 million.
articles.content:
